entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
